==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|あら|うみ}}

===Etymology 1===
/arumi<sub>1</sub>/ → /arumi/. Compound of {{compound|荒|tr1=ara|t1=rough|海|tr2=umi<sub>1</sub>|t2=sea|lang=ja}}. [[w:Old Japanese|Old Japanese]] did not permit vowel clusters, resulting in vowel elision of medial ''ua'' to ''u''.

====Pronunciation====
* {{IPA|[arumi]|lang=ja}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|あるみ}}

# a sea with rough waves
